name: TIMEOUT BAGS
description: Lockdown Activity Packs to cheer up kids in isolation, designed to motivate young creators and engage busy minds.  Each Activity Pack is crammed with 8 engaging activities, books, toys, games and snacks, delivered safely to your door. *Use code 'AshfordDelivers' at checkout, for collection orders from our no contact delivery box located at TN25 6NU. Deliveries can be arranged for a fee by selecting DPD or Hermes at checkout.
